column5: Sleded and I hit a couple of local ponds today in search of pike, mainly, but also spent some time chasing panfish. For the first time in history the pike fishing was actually better than the panfishing. We never did get a panfish. My highlight of the day was a 4lb OOS largemouth which I gave a long distance release at the hole (better that way). 16 feet was the magic number as that's where our fish hit. Sleded took the trophy of the day when he landed a beauty 32 inch pike on a chartreuse maribou jig of all things.  Was a great day to be out on the ice and despite people's whining there was 4-6 inches of ice everywhere we went.  The fog:    One of my Xmas presents, a new ice rod/tackle holder:    Sleded's beast:    A healthy release:    Great day on the ice, looking forward to many more!
whats that thing hes holding, I never seen one all summer/fall dammm ,nice outing
WTG Boys nice pike and good to see the reports starting .3 more days to go for me.  Would you look at that Wayne Rich has a new hat and I think it looks cool
Hey good goin guys and nice start to the hardwater season eh Sleded. Glad to see yas got out for some toothy action.
right on gents, good to see people getting out
Nice going boys.
Thanks for the report and pics boys! congrats on the PB pike sleded.
HAHAHA... probably just used some coloured markers to freshin it up! LOL  Nice outing Rich... good to see some nice fish this time of year!!!
Congrats on the PB Sleded. Never underestimate the power of a jig. Nice hat Rich.
lol I got that hat as a joke just for you, or I should say Sugarpacket got it for me for Christmas. She insisted I wear it on today's trip and take a pic, hahaha
Way to go Rich and Sleded.  Looks like it was a great day on the ice.  Joey
Hey Sugarpacket my wife wants to know where you got the cool hat....better let me know where cause the next time we see Rich she might take it....lol.
thanks guys it was a great day!! Thanks rich for helpin me land her!!
beauty fish guys!
Dammit man that looks cold!  Nice Toque Rich!  That's a beauty Pike for sure!!!  and good on y'all for releasing her!!!
nice job guys
Nice pike, congrats on the PB.
Good work boys, nice pike Eric...
What happened to the pic of the OOS bass?
After the trip, Sleded was so excitable that Jenna had to put him in his jolly jumper for a few hours to tucker him out.
I'm Thunderstruck!
